A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a film largely about failure and nostalgia. It depicts the same galaxy far far away\, but things aren't the same as it used to be. The simple missions that once could save the galaxy are not enough in this new era. They realise it too with the conflict becoming about the fate of past at one point. It is a wonderful film and an excellent addition to the series.
